body_html: cuDNN also has planning routines for choosing the best way to run a convolution (and a backward input conv, and backward weight conv). ATen will either need to implement a cache for these plans or will need to take handles in to retrieve an existing plan. Do you have a plan for what approach you want to take? I'd eventually like to have to cache.

ATen will either need to implement a cache for these plans or will need to take handles in to retrieve an existing plan. Do you have a plan for what approach you want to take?
